channel.title: Dying and Items
channel.description: Hey. I'm coding my own server atm and i've almost coded both Castle Wars and Duel Arena. I've got one problem with both, when you die .. you loose all your items and go back to home. How do i make it so when you die in cwars you get teleported back to your home base and dont loose any items and for duel arena, you tele back home but only loose your staked items? thanks

item.title: Dying and Items
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

i dont get it, what would i search and what would i have write for the death statement?
i found this when i searched ‘dead’

[code] public boolean ApplyDeadDuel() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 0;
resetDuel();
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
pEmote = 0x900;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDeadDuel();
}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
teleportToX = 2906;
teleportToY = 9685;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Fizzbitch: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
resetKeepItem();
resetDuel();
resetItems(3214);
sendMessage(“Dam You Lost Your Stake !”);
}
return true;
}

public void resetDuel() {
	duelWith = 0;
            duelStatus = -1;
            winDuel = false;
	for (int i = 0; i < duelItems.length; i++) {
                    duelRule[i] = false;
		duelItems[i] = 0;
		duelItemsN[i] = 0;
		otherDuelItems[i] = 0;
		otherDuelItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}[/code]

is that the right thing? what do i nee dto change if its right

Read full topic

for the death make a new death statement so if they die in that area that death statement gets called
